quotes.message: No man is free who cannot command himself.
quotes.name: Pythagoras

quotes.message: No confict is so severe as his who labors to subdue himself.
quotes.name: Thomas Kempis

quotes.message: Ultimately, the only power to which man should aspire is that which he exercises over himself.
quotes.name: Elie Wiesel

quotes.message: He who has power over himself has power over his greatest enemy.
quotes.name: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.message: He who reigns within himself, and rules passions, desires, and fears, is more than a king.
quotes.name: John Milton

quotes.message: Even a little self control can save you a lot of time, energy and errors.
quotes.name: Unkown

quotes.message: You can't always control the wind, but you can control your sails.
quotes.name: Dr. Bob Chope

quotes.message: You will never have a greater or lesser dominion than that over yourself.
quotes.name: da Vinci

quotes.message: Not being able to govern events, I govern myself, and apply myself to them, if they will not apply themselves to me.
quotes.name: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.message: I am, indeed, a king, because I know how to rule myself.
quotes.name: Pietro Aretino

quotes.message: I am the master of my fate; I am the captain of my soul.
quotes.name: William Henley

quotes.message: What lies in our power to do, it lies in our power not to do.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: The best time for you to hold your tongue is the time you feel you must say something or bust.
quotes.name: Josh Billings

quotes.message: Not to have control over the senses is like sailing in a rudderless ship, bound to break to pieces on coming in contact with the very first rock.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: You can never conquer the mountain. You can only conquer yourself.
quotes.name: Jim Whittaker

quotes.message: If you do not conquer self, you will be conquered by self.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: He that hath no rule over his own spirit is like a city that is broken down, and without walls.
quotes.name: Bible

quotes.message: In reading the lives of great men, I found that the first victory they won was over themselves.
quotes.name: Harry S. Truman

quotes.message: Self-control is the quality that distinguishes the fittest to survive.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Self-control is one mark of a mature person; it applies to control of language, physical treatment of others, and the appetites of the body.
quotes.name: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.message: The man who masters his own soul will forever be called conqueror of conquerors.
quotes.name: Plautus

quotes.message: The only power to which man should aspire is that which he exercises over himself.
quotes.name: Elie Wiesel

quotes.message: Most powerful is he who has himself in his own power.
quotes.name: Marcus Annaeus Seneca

quotes.message: Man who man would be, must rule the empire of himself.
quotes.name: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.message: Learning to control your reactions, saves you a lot of explaining, regretting, and apologizing.
quotes.name: Remez Sasson

quotes.message: If passion drives you, let reason hold the reins.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Self control is the power within you that holds the reins of anger, intolerance and impulsiveness.
quotes.name: Remez Sasson

quotes.message: He who conquers himself is the mightiest warrior.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: He who controls others may be powerful, but he who has mastered himself is mightier still.
quotes.name: Tao Te Ching

quotes.message: To conquer oneself is a greater task than conquering others.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: You cannot control what happens to you, but you can control your attitude toward what happens to you, and in that, you will be mastering change rather than allowing it to master you.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: Govern thyself then you will be able to govern the world.
quotes.name: Unkown

quotes.message: Rule your mind or it will rule you.
quotes.name: Horace

quotes.message: Self-command is the main elegance.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Man cannot live without self-control.
quotes.name: Isaac Singer

quotes.message: The first and best victory is to conquer self. To be conquered by self is, of all things, the most shameful and objectionable.
quotes.name: Plato

quotes.message: Such power there is in clear-eyed self-restraint.
quotes.name: James Russell Lowell

quotes.message: As far as your self-control goes, as far goes your freedom.
quotes.name: Marie Ebner-Eschenbach

quotes.message: There is little that can withstand a man who can conquer himself.
quotes.name: Louis XIV

quotes.message: He who conquers others is strong; he who conquers himself is mighty.
quotes.name: Lao-Tzu

quotes.message: You have power over your mind, not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
quotes.name: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.message: I count him braver who overcomes his desires than him who conquers his enemies; for the hardest victory is over self.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: To keep one's mouth from evil and depraved talk; not to love much speaking.
quotes.name: St. Benedict

quotes.message: Our self-will is so subtle and deeply rooted within us, so covered with excuses and defended by false reasoning that it seems a devil.
quotes.name: St. Catherine of Genoa

quotes.message: Willpower was shaped by the guiding force of self-discipline.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Such power there is in clear-eyed self-restraint.
quotes.name: James Russell Lowell

quotes.message: There never has been, and cannot be, a good life without self-control.
quotes.name: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.message: The difference between a savior and a sinner is this: that the one has perfect control of all the forces within him; the other is dominated and controlled by them.
quotes.name: James Allen

quotes.message: Remember there is always a limit to self-indulgence, but none to self-restraint.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: One must train oneself, small and frequent efforts, to dominate one's feelings.
quotes.name: Alexis Carrel

quotes.message: The wise who control body, speech, and mind are indeed the consummately controlled.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: Who has a harder fight than he who is striving to overcome self?
quotes.name: Thomas a Kempis

quotes.message: He that has not mastery over his inclinations, he that knows not how to resist the importunity of present pleasure or pain...is in danger of never being good for anything.
quotes.name: John Locke

quotes.message: Self-restraint may be alien to the human temperament, but humanity without restraint will dig its own grave.
quotes.name: Marya Mannes

quotes.message: A horse that resists the reins, a car without brakes, and a person with no self-control, are all equally headed for disaster.
quotes.name: Satya Sai Baba

quotes.message: Our own inner child has to be disciplined in order to release its tremendous spiritual power.
quotes.name: Marion Boa Woodman

quotes.message: Self-discipline does within while you do without.
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: It is a great deal of medicine that possesses a child and robs it of all self-control.
quotes.name: Yoruba Proverb

quotes.message: Ask for advise from those who evidence good self-discipline.
quotes.name: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.message: He who does not control his impulse classes himself with beasts.
quotes.name: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.message: Self-control can be defined as the effortful attempts by a person to change thoughts, feelings, and behaviors in order to reach long-term interests or goals.
quotes.name: Muraven & Baumeister 2000

quotes.message: For a mind is a terrible thing to waste and someone will use it if you don't. Take over; that is a manual for self-control.
quotes.name: Jacobie Allison

quotes.message: Never respond to an angry person with a fiery comeback, even if he deserves it...Don't allow his anger to become your anger.
quotes.name: Bohdi Sanders

quotes.message: Any woman who is sure of her own wits, is a match, at any time, for a man who is not sure of his own temper.
quotes.name: Wilkie Collins

quotes.message: Self-control is the chief element in self-respect, and self-respect is the chief element in courage.
quotes.name: Thucydides

quotes.message: I cannot trust a man to control others who cannot control himself.
quotes.name: Robert E. Lee

quotes.message: Self-control is strength. Right thought is mastery. Calmness is power.
quotes.name: James Allen

quotes.message: Mastering self-control, the act of restraining oneâ€™s emotions is the true key to success.
quotes.name: Timothy Pina

quotes.message: In that power of self-control lies the seed of eternal freedom.
quotes.name: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.message: He who angers you conquers you.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Kenny

quotes.message: You have no control over what the other guy does. You only have control over what you do.
quotes.name: A.J. Kitt

quotes.message: Your brain shall be your servant instead of your master. You will rule it instead of allowing it to rule you.
quotes.name: Charles Popplestone
